name: Fun Drift Car Racing A City Traffic Driving & Go Racing Career Simulator Game
name_original: Fun Drift Car Racing A City Traffic Driving & Go Racing Career Simulator Game
description:
Just drift and fun by collecting maximum points before the time runs out.
Fast Car Racing 3D Drift & Fun is the ultimate car drifting game of 2016. Stop worrying for car damage and do unreal stunts in the sports zone. Get ready for the fearless racing challenge in blazing fast cars. Do serious tyre burnouts on asphalt roads and perform crazy car stunts in uncharted 3D city. Experience surreal car driving with turbo jet engine for speed racing. Become a daredevil car racer and go for xtreme auto drifting adventures. You drive fast speed racing machine to compete for the title of champion car drifter.


Play the best sports car simulator game and enjoy free roaming in most amazing 3D city environment. Burnout tyres like a furious racer using brakes and race pedals. Take risky car driver job to next level addiction and collect maximum gold coins. Unlock the upgraded cars using in-game coins. Beware of road mines spread around city streets. Driving over mines will blow up your car after crazy jump. Do not crash into city traffic and drift as much as you can to earn maximum points. Test your nerves to drive real cars at top speed around curvy roads and do crazy stunts in sports arena. Immerse in fast paced gameplay and show rigorous driving skills.


Key Features of Fast Car Racing 3D Drift & Fun game:
Endless racing mode for free roaming in uncharted town
Unlock multiple sports vehicles like luxury autos & buggy car
Collect coins and avoid blast mines
Realistic car physics
Collect checkpoint timers for longer gameplay time
Insane car stunts and crazy drifting
Flawless car controls for swift driving
Smooth ABS braking for best drifting experience
Real cars in amazing 3D city environment
Cute graphics and enthralling sounds


Enjoy extreme car driving on asphalt highway and blaze through sharp turns in high speed. Fast Car Racing 3D Drift & Fun is action packed game filled with crazy stunts and thrilling adventures. With ultra revved engine no need to use nitro boost, just press accelerometer and get ready to blown away. Dodge risky obstacles at incredibly fast speed. Fasten seat belts and witness the fearsome car drifting while doing death defying stunts in crazy stunt arena. Leave racing rivals stunned over your reckless racing expertise. Be your own stunt hero in real drift cars.


We hope you enjoy our real drifting car simulator game. Give your feedback to see more updates in next releases!
